fields.description: Resources are delivered remotely with the use of a physical infrastructure. The user is able to remotely work with the physical RI without the need of physical presence.
fields.name: Remote

fields.description: The Resource is delivered through a virtual infrastructure that the use may access virtually through the web or an intranet.
fields.name: Virtual

fields.description: Resources require a physical presence of the user. The user can only access the RI if he is physically present in the specific location that the RI is offered.
fields.name: Physical

fields.description: Samples are sent in to for e.g. analysis and the results are returned to the user without the user actually accessing the RI
fields.name: Mail-In
